main event: A family observed a ball-shaped object with a tail for about 10-15 seconds during a UFO sighting in 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a basketball at arm's length,Four observers were present during the sighting,The object was visible for 2 minutes and 10-15 seconds by different witnesses,The sighting was reported to possibly be caused by a meteor,No additional reports were found in the file.
sighted object: a ball-shaped object with a tail
